content.body:
### Shop 245/60R18 Tire Size 245/60R18 tires are used on larger vehicles such as full-sized SUVs and some pickup trucks. There’s a good chance your tires are 245/60R18 if you drive an Acura MDX, Ford Edge, Honda Ridgeline, Hyundai Palisade, Kia Telluride, Lincoln Nautilus, Toyota Highlander, Volkswagen Atlas, and these vehicle are typically outfitted with great tires like the Michelin Latitude Tour HP, Firestone Destination LE2, Bridgestone Dueler H/P Sport AS, [Pirelli Scorpion Zero All Season](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/scorpion-zero-all-season), or Goodyear Assurance Finesse when they leave the factory. Popular vehicles: 2014-2020 Acura MDX
2007-2021 Ford Edge
2009-2014 and 2017-2021 Honda Ridgeline
2020-2021 Hyundai Palisade
2020-2021 Kia Telluride
2019-2021 Lincoln Nautilus
2014-2019 Toyota Highlander
2018-2021 Volkswagen Atlas Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform well in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. If you’re looking for a new set of 245/60R18 tires that aren’t OE for your ride, check out all-season tires like the [Continental CrossContact LX25](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/crosscontact-lx25),Nokian One, Nitto Crosstek 2, or Falken Ziex CT60 A/S for great traction and performance year-round. Due to their larger size, some drivers of these vehicles decide to use 245/60R18 highway terrain tires thanks to their higher load carrying capacity and slightly better off-road performance than an all-season tire. Consider the General Grabber HTS60,[Yokohama Geolandar H/T G056](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-h-t-g506), Nexen Roadian HTX RH5, or Kumho Crugen HT51 if you want a tire that’s tough enough to carry heavier loads to and from a job site without sacrificing traction. Do you live in an area that gets heavy snow and ice? While all-season tires provide good performance year-round, their rubber compound stiffens up in colder temperatures which makes it more difficult to grip the road. Check out the Bridgestone Blizzak DM-V2, Nokian Nordman 7 SUV, [Hankook Winter i Pike (RW11)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/winter-i-pike-rw11), or Toyo Observe G3-Ice if you want a 245/60R18 tire that provides best-in-class traction and performance in ice, snow, and lower temperatures. Whether you drive a larger SUV like a Ford Edge or Volkswagen Atlas, a pickup truck like the Honda Ridgeline, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 245/60R18 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
